news.title: West Antarctic ice sheet could disappear in next 1,000 years
news.summary: London, Feb 10 (IANS) A future warming of the Southern Ocean caused by rising greenhouse gas concentrations in the atmosphere may severely disrupt the stability of the West Antarctic ice masses and they may disappear within the next 1,000 years…

news.title: Global warming: West Antarctic ice sheet could melt in next 1,000 years!
